name: Tap City Tycoon
summary:
Make money and build the city as much as possible. Prove you’re the rich man!
You have a great chance to control the cities and countries. You just need to start by tapping the screen as much as you can. Tap your way into riches and money by upgrading buildings and investing in your city. The more cash you invest in businesses the more money they produce for you.
Hire valuable Managers to unlock special business bonuses, and use Ondelz resources for even more cash bonuses!
